title: shrI valmIka lingam
sahitya:
shrI valmIka lingam cintayE shivArddhAngam cintayE


anupallavi

 shrI varadAyakam shrI puranAyakam dEvatAdi vinuta divya vIthI viTankam


caraNam   kurukSEtra virinci yajnOdbhava kArmuka dhara muraripu hata harihayAdyakhilAsura bhayOpadrava 
haraNa caNataram shankaram sOma kulAmbikAmbhOja madhukaram guruguha janakam natajanakam 
kubEra sakham carmAmshukam surucira shirOdhrta shashAnkam svayam prakAshakam tArakam
